139221.「他に 何か用はありますか？\n<select_se_off>\nクラスを変更す:
Is there anything else you need?
<select_se_off>
Change class
Change your appearance
Change your preferences
Personality Assessment
Class publication settings
Explanation
<select_end>
<break>

139223.「本当に クラスを変更しますか？\n<yesno_2><break>:
Are you sure you want to change classes?
<yesno_2><break>

139225.「クラスを変更したいのですね。\n 確かに そのような制度は あるのですが\n:
So you want to change your class. Yes, there is such a system, but there are conditions, so please listen carefully. You cannot return to
your original class, so please think carefully before doing so. Also, please note that you cannot change your class again within one week
after you have changed your class.

139227.「あら。\n 新しいクラスになって １週間以内のようね。\n まだ クラス変更は:
Oh, my. Looks like you've been in your new class for less than a week. You can't change classes yet. If you want to change your class,
can you come back in <%dL_DAY>?

139229.「手続きを 受け付けました。\n クラスを変更することで\n 学生手帳も 新しい:
We have accepted your application. Your student handbook will be changed to the new one when you change your class. Please pick up
your new student handbook from the Admissions Guide Flasse at the Gran Zedora Station.

139230.「申し訳ありません。\n なんでもいいので 好きなものを\n 教えていただけます:
I am sorry. Can you tell us anything you like?
<bw_break>

139232.「入力した内容を 破棄して\n よろしいですか？\n<yesno_2><brea:
Are you sure you want to destroy your entry?
<yesno_2><break>

139234.「では どのフレンドのクラスに\n 移動するか 教えてもらえますか。\n<bre:
So can you tell me which Friend's class you
would like to move to.
<break>

139236.「何について 聞きたいのでしょう？\n<select_se_off>\nクラス変:
What is it that you want to ask me about?
<select_se_off>
Change of Class
Change of Appearance
About changing your preferences
About Personality Assessment
About class public settings
<select_end>
<break>

139238.「今のクラスから 別のクラスへ\n 変更できる制度が あるのですが\n いくつか:
We have a system that allows you to change from one class to another, but there are some conditions. We will decide which class you
want to move to, or you can choose a friend's class. If you want to go back to your old class, you will not be able to do so, so
please think carefully before doing so. Also, please note that you will not be able to change classes again within one week of taking
your new class.

139240.「今 みんなに お知らせしている\n あなたの すきなものを 変更できます。\n:
You can change your favorite thing to do. You
can change it anytime and as many times as you
like.
<bw_break>

139242.「みんなに お知らせする\n 好きなものを 変更してもよろしいですか？\n<ye:
May I change my favorite thing to let everyone
know?
<yesno><break>

139244.「では 新しく設定する\n すきなものを 教えてもらえますか。\n<break>:
Now, can you tell us what you would like to
set up?
<break>

139246.「了解しました。\n すきなものを 変更しておきますね。\n<bw_break>:
I understand. I'll change the ones you like.
<bw_break>

139248.「よくいらっしゃいました。\n ここでは すきなものを変更したり\n クラスの変:
I have been here a lot. Here you can change
your favorite classes or request a change of
class.
<select_se_off>
Change class
Change your appearance
Change your preferences
Personality Assessment
Class publication settings
Explanation
<select_end>
<break>

139771.「また 変更したくなりましたら\n いつでも 来てくださいね。\n<end>:
If you ever want to make any changes, please
feel free to come back anytime.
<end>

140305.「確かに クラス変更は 可能なのですが\n 今は 教室が 封印されてしまっていて:
Yes, it is possible to change classes, but right now the classrooms are sealed and that system is not working. I'm sorry, but you
can't change classes right now. I wish we could do something about the sealed room.

153810.「申し訳ありません。\n そちらは 登録できない単語が\n 含まれている ようで:
Sorry about that. It seems you have included a
word that cannot be registered.
<bw_break>

154060.「もう一度 性格診断を行いますか？\n<yesno_2><break>:
Would you like to run the personality test
again?
<yesno_2><break>

154061.「わかりました。\n では 今からする質問に 答えてください。\n それによって:
I understand. Now, please answer the questions I'm about to ask you. It will help us to determine your personality. There is no great
significance, so you may take it easy, but please answer with an open mind.

159587.「あら？ あなたは現在\n 部活動の行事に 参加中のようですね。\n<br>\n:
Oh? I see that you are currently participating in a club event. If I change classes, I will have to participate in club activities in my
new class. Is that okay with you?

159588.「あら？ あなたはまだ\n 今月の 部活動の報酬を\n 受け取って いないみたい:
Oh? I see that you have not yet received this month's club activity fees. Please receive the rewards for your club activities before
changing classes.

159589.「入学時の性格診断を もう一度\n 行うことが できます。\n<br>\n「新た:
You can take the personality test again at the time of enrollment. You are welcome to take this test if you want to start your school
life with a fresh mind, but please answer the questions with an honest heart.

175855.「あなたのクラスを\n フレンドに 公開するか\n 設定を変更できます。\n<s:
You can choose to make your classes public to
your friends or change the settings.
<select_se_off>
Make public
Keep private
<select_end>
<close>

175856.「あなたのクラスを\n フレンドに 公開するかを設定できます。\n<br>\n「:
You can set your class to "Public" or "Private" if you want to invite your friends to your class. If you want to invite your
friends to your class, please set it to "Public".

175871.「移動可能な\n フレンドのクラスが\n 存在しないようですね。\n<bw_br:
It seems that there is no movable class of
friends.
<bw_break>

175872.フレンドへのクラス公開設定を\n『非公開』に 設定しました！\n<end>:
The class disclosure setting to friends has
been set to "Private"!
<end>

175873.フレンドへのクラス公開設定を\n『公開』に 設定しました！\n<end>:
The class disclosure setting to friends has
been set to "Public"!
<end>

175887.「どちらの方法での\n クラス変更を ご希望ですか？\n<select_se_o:
Which method would you prefer to use to change
classes?
<select_se_off>
Go to any class
Go to a friend's class
<select_end>
<close>

177834.「申し訳ありません。\n そのフレンドのクラスは\n 空きがないため 移動できま:
We are sorry. There are no openings in that
friend's class, so you will not be moved.
<bw_break>

177835.「申し訳ありません。\n クラス替えの手続きが 行えなかったようです。\n もう:
We apologize for the inconvenience. It seems
we were unable to complete the class change
procedure. Please try again.
<bw_break>

181524.「そのフレンドは\n あなたと 同じクラスのようですね。\n<bw_break>:
It seems that this friend is in the same class
as you.
<bw_break>

185001.「あなたの学園での 容姿と性別を\n 変える魔法を かけ直すことができます。\n:
I can cast a spell to change your appearance
and gender at the school. Are you sure you
want to do this?
<yesno2><break>

185002.「では 魔法をかけますので\n あなたの 学生としての見た目を\n 決めてくださ:
Now, I'm going to cast a spell, and I want you
to decide what you want to look like as a
student.
<end>

185003.「学園の中での 容姿と性別を\n 変えることができる 特別な魔法を\n かけ直す:
You can cast a special spell to change your appearance and gender in the school. However, if Mr. Revaivah's magic makes you look like you
do in Astoltia, you cannot reapply it.

185046.「恋人がいる場合 今の性別を変えると\n その恋人との関係は 親友になります。\:
If you have a lover, changing your current gender will make your relationship with that lover your best friend. Do you really want to
change it?

245536.「今のあなたには 学園での 容姿と性別を\n 変える魔法は かけ直せないようです:
It seems that you can't cast the spell to change your appearance and gender at the school right now, so please consult Mr.
Revaivah.
